room_title: Escape room "The Parlor" by Escape Room Park City in Salt Lake City
room_description:
You've just gotten letter saying a great uncle, one you didn't even know you had, was murdered yesterday, AND YOU'RE BEING FRAMED FOR IT! Uncle Rusty directed the executor of his will to contact you after his death because he knew his murderer was going to be a close family member.

You and your group of newly-found relatives need to work together to figure out the clues and puzzles Uncle Rusty left behind in his parlor and identify the REAL killer before the police arrive in 1 hour.
